author: jbohn
msg: GERONIMO-4507 Admin console should honor the priority of user agent's language setting - patch by Gang Yin

author: ritchiem
msg: FileUtils : Was not correctly handling the case where a File object became null, it would previously have thrown a NPE which was erroneously caught this and declared the delete to have failed. If there is nothing to delete (signified by the Null File object) then the delete should pass.
